doc.after: Astronomy is a natural science that is the study of celestial objects such as moons planets stars nebulae and galaxies the physics chemistry and evolution of such objects and phenomena that originate outside the atmosphere of Earth including supernovae explosions gamma ray bursts and cosmic background radiation
